entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • (Suggestion) Blazor: RenderFragment target String #39506
  • [WIP] ASP.NET Core Roadmap for .NET 7 #39504
    7.0.0
  • Allow acr_values and ui_locales to be specified in OpenIdConnectOptions #39503
  • Issue with Multiple Schemes, context.AuthenticateAsync(scheme) not able to authenticate in version 6.0.0 onwards #39500
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #39497
  • Perf improvement: updates #39496
  • Add support for Blazor Component Extension like C# code extension for reusable components #39494
  • Quarantine StopProcessingNextRequestSendsGracefulGOAWAYThenFinalGOAWAYWhenAllStreamsComplete #39492
  • Expose reason why ValidateAsync in IUserTwoFactorTokenProvider fail #39491
  • Analyzer: warn when marking a route parameter as optional if it isn't at the end of a route #39486
    Backlog
  • [Blazor server 6.0] httpContextAccessor.httpcontext is null when fallback to Long Polling #39485
  • Initializing a new HubConnectionContext for unit tests results in System.NullReferenceException #39484
  • Blazor Server App never frees memory #39483
    .NET 7 Planning
  • .Net6 Blazor SignalR Hub Connection causing high CPU in web browser #39482
  • Quarantine AcceptNewStreamsDuringClosingConnection #39479
  • Quarantine StreamPool_MultipleStreamsConcurrent_StreamsReturnedToPool #39477
  • UseStatusCodePagesWithReExecute should respect [SkipStatusCodePages] #39472
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Ref needs to be produced and versioned correctly in servicing for source-build #39471

Closed

  • k8s docker connection reset by peer / Unexpected end of request content #39393
  • Receiving [Browserslist] Could not parse <ProjectDirectory>/ClientApp/package.json when using ASP.NET+React.js template #39309
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, fortunes_ef #39466
  • Hello, I have an issue that I might think is a bug. #39495
  • Typing mistake in Analyzers section #39481
  • Razor non-nullable Parameter with EditorRequired attribute still produces CS8618 warning #39418
  • Blazor virtualization can't work with `flex-wrap: wrap` and grid layouts #39468
  • Blazor Web Assembly - Debugger crashes on VS 2022 after OIDC redirect #39301
    Backlog
  • Go back to Windows.11.Amd64.ClientPre.Open #39363
  • IConfigurationBuilder.Sources.Clear totally destroys possibility to changeURLS.. #39432
  • VS2022 v17.0.3: Blazor Web Assembly: ASP.NET Core Hosted: .Net 6: Publish: dotnet.timezones.blat: Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' #39231
  • Integrity hashes do not match between browser and blazor.boot.json (even with rebuild/clean) #39240
  • Test Automation Failure .NET Core 2.1 #39245

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ConfigureHttpJsonOptions for M.A.Htt.Json.JsonOptions #39502
    area-runtime
  • Bump follow-redirects from 1.14.1 to 1.14.7 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #39490
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Added InputTime as native blazor control #39489
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Feature Request Issue Template #39473
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Stop trying to launch browser from codespaces #39505
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Enable warnings for IDE0062 #39463
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Revert "[release/6.0] Switch to Windows.Amd64.Server2022.Open (#39364)" #39476
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.2
  • Fix spelling in comment #39498
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • VSCode Extension Recomendations #39474
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine StopProcessingNextRequestSendsGracefulGOAWAYThenFinalGOAWAYWhenAllStreamsComplete #39493
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Enable IDE0059 #39434
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Update Readme.md #39487
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine StreamPool_MultipleStreamsConcurrent_StreamsReturnedToPool #39478
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine AcceptNewStreamsDuringClosingConnection #39480
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Revert "[main] Switch to Windows.Amd64.Server2022.Open (#39365)" #39475
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Preserve UseUrls() setting when configuration sources are cleared #39433
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Detect HTTP/2 connection sent to HTTP/1.1 endpoint #39402
    area-runtime
  • Added IServiceProvider to DataAnnotationsValidator #39445
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [WIP] ANCM + Arm64 + helix #39420
    area-infrastructure
  • Use view buffers during pre-rendering #39465
    area-mvc
  • chore (package.json) : Update packages to latest #39460
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • fix #39398 #39451
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Added API analyzer functionality for conditional return expressions #39242
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks
  • Trim "Async" Suffix #39128
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Mechanism for providing validation CSS class names through DI #34777
    area-mvc, community-contribution
